last_episode_to_air.name: Exactly How We Planned
last_episode_to_air.overview: When Ghost is announced as Lt. Governor it gives him a solid win and makes him one step closer to a fully legitimate world. He soon discovers one of his many enemies carrying out a plan that changes his life forever.

name: Power
overview: A successful New York entrepreneur lives a double life as the head of a drug empire that serves only the rich and influential, all while wanting to escape the underworld and keep his family safe.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Season two picks up right where it left off: James “Ghost” St. Patrick doubling down on his drug business to save his nightclub and dream of a legitimate future. Ghost’s work troubles pale in comparison to juggling his relationship with his wife, Tasha, and his first love, Angela, who’s also an Assistant US Attorney investigating his drug organization. Ghost is set further back from his dream by his business partner, Tommy, who loves the drug game, and his former mentor, Kanan, fresh out of jail and looking for revenge.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Will James St. Patrick's dream of leaving the drug game and finding love with the woman sworn to bring him to justice end before it begins with the specter of "Ghost" coming back to haunt him? Be careful what you wish for.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Ghost can’t outrun his past choices and mounting enemies this season, which threatens his freedom and his family’s safety at every turn.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: Season 5 picks up with James “Ghost” St. Patrick in a dangerous alliance with his former drug partner Tommy Egan and mortal enemy Kanan Stark. As Ghost mourns, he searches for vengeance and throws himself into his work, reaching new, professional heights. But with this newfound publicity, his quest for blood threatens to dismantle his legitimate legacy. Ghost is blind to new enemies and, as the Feds grow closer to unmasking his true identity, Ghost must remain vigilant toward those wanting to take him down for his past criminal enterprises.

seasons.name: Season 6
seasons.overview: The sixth and final season picks up with James “Ghost” St. Patrick seeking vengeance. His former drug partner and brother in arms must pay for the ultimate betrayal. Rocked to his core by the perfidiousness and cruelties of those he once called his family, Ghost devotes himself to one notion: Success is the best revenge, with all intentions of getting both.

episodes.name: Not Exactly How We Planned
episodes.overview: James "Ghost" St. Patrick opens Truth nightclub, hoping its success will let him leave his life as a NYC drug kingpin. But a run-in with a past love and a drug-related attack threaten him.

episodes.name: Whoever He Is
episodes.overview: Ghost and Tommy respond to the attacks on the drug business, Ghost's wife Tasha laments his new club career, and Ghost rekindles his relationship with Angela - a US Attorney chasing Ghost's distributor.

episodes.name: This Is Real
episodes.overview: A model's near-death in Truth jeopardizes the club's future. The rift between Ghost and Tasha over the nightclub widens. Ghost is reminded that pursuing Angela - and a legit life - could endanger his family.

episodes.name: Who Are You?
episodes.overview: Ghost and Tommy plan to gather their network of gang leaders while Angela plans surveillance for the same meeting. The mystery assailant strikes again. Ghost admits to Angela that he's married with children.

episodes.name: I Gotta Go
episodes.overview: Concerned over Ghost's attitude, Tasha interferes with club business. Ghost and Angela pursue their affair. Tommy dates a club employee. Ghost and Tommy agree that gang leader Ruiz is behind the attacks.

episodes.name: Who You With?
episodes.overview: Tommy makes peace with Ruiz while Angela has one of Ruiz's gang wired. Ghost forgets Tasha's birthday. Ghost and Angela confront the reality of their affair. Ghost's driver speaks too candidly to Tasha.

episodes.name: Loyalty
episodes.overview: Tasha sees Angela for the first time. Ghost learns a friend may be behind the hits while Angela races to stop the next attack. Ghost makes a commitment to Angela. The mastermind behind the attacks is revealed.

episodes.name: Best Laid Plans
episodes.overview: Ghost plans a huge party at Think, hoping to expand out of NYC and the drug world. Pink Sneakers attempts to murder Ghost. Ghost makes a big decision in an attempt to achieve his dream of going legit.

episodes.name: Consequences
episodes.overview: Ghost picks up the pieces at Truth after the botched murder attempt against him, while recommitting to the drug game. Tommy disappears after learning that Angela's with the feds.

episodes.name: No Friends on the Street
episodes.overview: Tommy agrees to help Ghost expand the drug business under one condition - Ghost uses Angela to discover what she knows about them. Kanan's release from jail is a surprise for Ghost.

episodes.name: Like We're Any Other Couple
episodes.overview: Ghost finally takes Angela to Miami. They live the fantasy of being a couple, but the reality of her investigation destroys it. Back in New York, Tommy and Kanan become close.

episodes.name: You're the Only Person I Can Trust
episodes.overview: Ghost fights to retain control over everyone in his life: Tommy, Angela, Tasha and Simon Stern, who is making it impossible for him to win back his club.

episodes.name: Who You Are and Who You Want to Be
episodes.overview: Ghost and Tommy work to sell all of the product in time to pay Lobos, unaware that Holly is being questioned by the FBI. With every passing hour, Angela grows closer to the truth.

episodes.name: Why Her?
episodes.overview: After learning that Ghost and Jamie are the same man, Angela looks for proof. A new member joins the drug syndicate. Tasha makes a wife's ultimate sacrifice to protect her future.

episodes.name: You're Not the Man
episodes.overview: Tommy's on edge about Holly's disappearance after talking with the feds. Ghost and Tasha work to rein him in. Angela seems to believe Ghost when he explains his actions...or does she?

episodes.name: Three Moves Ahead
episodes.overview: Danger closes in on Ghost and Tommy as Lobos fends off a rival drug cartel and the feds. Ghost scrambles to get from underneath Lobos before Angela gets to him first.

episodes.name: Time's Up
episodes.overview: Tommy's locked up as Angela and the feds push him to flip on Lobos or spend his life in jail. Ghost works to do the right thing - but the consequences of his actions are steep.

episodes.name: Ghost Is Dead
episodes.overview: Bodies from Ghost's organization are dropping left and right, each death inching closer to Ghost and Tommy. Both the threat of Kanan and Angela's investigation are just as lethal.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Season two picks up right where it left off: James “Ghost” St. Patrick doubling down on his drug business to save his nightclub and dream of a legitimate future. Ghost’s work troubles pale in comparison to juggling his relationship with his wife, Tasha, and his first love, Angela, who’s also an Assistant US Attorney investigating his drug organization. Ghost is set further back from his dream by his business partner, Tommy, who loves the drug game, and his former mentor, Kanan, fresh out of jail and looking for revenge.

episodes.name: Call Me James
episodes.overview: Out of the drug game, James is ready to leave "Ghost" behind. Angela must decide between love and honor. Tasha reels from the death of Shawn. Tommy is forced to make some bold moves.

episodes.name: It's Never Over
episodes.overview: Ghost scrambles to tie up loose ends while he deals with new nightlife competition. Tommy confronts Tasha, as she and Angela must learn to coexist. Tommy gains an advisor in his returned love, Holly.

episodes.name: I Got This on Lock
episodes.overview: Ghost is presented with an opportunity that could take the clubs to the next level, all while looking over his shoulder. Tommy reunites with Tasha in a scheme, while he also tries to keep a contact under control.

episodes.name: Don't Worry, Baby
episodes.overview: As the opportunity to expand the clubs evolves, Ghost is spread even thinner between Angela, the kids, business, and Tommy. Tommy struggles with a decision, Kanan gets back into the life, and Angela faces doubts.

episodes.name: Help Me
episodes.overview: Tommy searches for who made the attempt on his life. Greg leans on Ruiz to give up the true "Ghost", while Angela does all she can to keep them away. Proctor informs Ghost he may have a new problem.

episodes.name: The Right Decision
episodes.overview: Tommy and Ghost reunite to take out a dangerous foe, enlisting Tasha in a plan to escape detection by Angela and her team. While Tommy soldiers forward, Ghost loses control at a crucial moment.

episodes.name: Don't Go
episodes.overview: Angela reels after her breakup, but must face some difficult questions at work. Ghost must scramble to not lose the club deal, while he and Tommy are forced back into the game. Dre learns the meaning of the La Arana card.

episodes.name: Trust Me
episodes.overview: Mike and Angela hunt for the mole. Angela gets a lead, while she must solidify Tommy's alibi. Tasha receives a warning as Tariq makes a dangerous new friend. Milan issues an edict to push a new product.

episodes.name: I Call the Shots
episodes.overview: Angela takes action to find the mole, while Ghost makes a move to regain the club deal. Ghost and Tasha fall into a familiar role while Kanan has a dark influence on Tariq. Milan warns Tommy of the price of betrayal.

episodes.name: In My Best Interest
episodes.overview: Ghost races to retrieve evidence, while he throws the party of his career. Tasha forms an unlikely alliance in an attempt to save her family. But will Tommy make a move that will change everyone's life forever?

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Will James St. Patrick's dream of leaving the drug game and finding love with the woman sworn to bring him to justice end before it begins with the specter of "Ghost" coming back to haunt him? Be careful what you wish for.

episodes.name: When I Get Out
episodes.overview: Having been arrested for the murder of Agent Knox, Ghost faces threats from all angles. The Feds begin to build their case and Tasha scrambles to get bail. Tommy navigates his new role and enlists help in recovering Tariq.

episodes.name: Things Are Going To Get Worse
episodes.overview: Proctor works to protect his client as Ghost faces harassment. The team discusses their strategy for taking down St. Patrick. Tommy struggles to let go of his old duties. Tasha talks to the kids about what's going on.

episodes.name: The Kind of Man You Are
episodes.overview: The prosecutors turn up the heat, forcing Tommy to execute a plan that diverts their attention. Teresi learns information about Ghost and begins a blackmail scheme. And in his father's absence, Tariq seeks out Kanan.

episodes.name: We're in This Together
episodes.overview: Mak brings Angela back onto the prosecution team and gives her a task that brings her face-to-face with Tasha. Julio struggles to manage the primeras below him and Tommy's behavior. Tariq continues running with Kanan.

episodes.name: Don't Thank Me
episodes.overview: With tensions high, Silver warns Ghost that Tasha may have to testify. Meanwhile, now aware of Ghost's innocence, Angela struggles to find a way to stop the prosecution. And Teresi sets a plan in motion to eliminate Ghost.

episodes.name: New Man
episodes.overview: Returning to Truth - Ghost finds himself trapped in a new business venture. Tommy escapes to Chicago for a meeting that takes a turn. And with Ghost released, Jukebox and Kanan revisit their plan to kidnap Tariq.

episodes.name: You Lied to My Face
episodes.overview: As Ghost moves forward with his new business, the St. Patrick family is thrust into the public eye. Tasha seeks out Silver and their relationship deepens. When Tommy returns, Dre talks himself into a promotion.

episodes.name: It's Done
episodes.overview: When Ghost sees the location for the business is in a gang-infested, he re-teams with Tommy to clean it up. As Tommy threatens war, his organization starts to destabilize. And, unhappy, Tariq looks to some old friends.

episodes.name: That Ain't Me
episodes.overview: When Ghost realizes he's getting screwed, he starts playing dirty. After meeting the boss, Angela explores other options. Tommy gets proof that paints Kate in a new light. And with people after him, Tariq hatches a plan.

episodes.name: You Can't Fix This
episodes.overview: When tragedy befalls the St. Patrick family, Ghost and Tommy seek retribution. Tasha tries to keep things together at home. Meanwhile, Angela uses her own skills resources to figure out what Ghost is hiding.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: Ghost can’t outrun his past choices and mounting enemies this season, which threatens his freedom and his family’s safety at every turn.

episodes.name: Everyone Is Implicated
episodes.overview: James "Ghost" St. Patrick forms a dangerous alliance with his brother-in-arms, Tommy, and his mortal enemy, Kanan; Angela is implicated in murder and turns to an unlikely ally; Tasha enlists LaKeisha to protect Tariq.

episodes.name: Damage Control
episodes.overview: The St. Patrick family grieves Raina while the AUSA's office discusses taking down "Ghost" and ending Angela's career. Councilman Tate exploits Raina's death. Dre maintains order within his organization.

episodes.name: Are We On The Same Team?
episodes.overview: Ghost and Tasha butt heads on how to grieve. Angela pursues the Jimenez Cartel while Kanan goes after Dre's organization. Tommy confides in LaKeisha about his relationship with Teresi, complicating everyone's lives.

episodes.name: Second Chances
episodes.overview: Tensions run high when Jason returns. Ghost warns Tommy about Teresi while he hatches a plan with Kanan to rid Tommy of his new family. Angela gets closer to arresting the Jimenez Cartel. Kanan forms an unlikely alliance.

episodes.name: Happy Birthday
episodes.overview: The St. Patricks celebrate Tariq's birthday without Raina. Ghost is on the outs with Tate and learns Dre is ready to replace him in the legitimate world. Kanan drops Tariq at school, bonding over their mistrust of Ghost.

episodes.name: A Changed Man?
episodes.overview: After his spiritual awakening with Rev. Macedon, Ghost confesses his sins to Angela. Angela preps Tasha for Federal questioning and Ghost must break his business deal with Tommy when Truth is audited by the IRS.

episodes.name: The Devil Inside
episodes.overview: Ghost, Tommy and Kanan move forward with their task to kill the heads of the Jimenez Cartel. Donovan warns Angela that her own office is after her. LaKeisha lets slip that Teresi is Tommy's father.

episodes.name: A Friend of the Family
episodes.overview: The AUSA turns up the heat on Ghost and implicates his inner circle in on a RICO; Ghost and Tommy plan to frame Dre for the murder of Raymond Jones, Raina's killer; Angela and Tasha enact a plan of their own.

episodes.name: There's a Snitch Among Us
episodes.overview: When Angela's arrest of Jimenez gives her a solid win, she discovers plans that would undercut her career; Ghost tasks Tommy in killing a snitch, changing all of their lives; Tariq accepts the consequences of his choices.

episodes.name: When This Is Over
episodes.overview: When the RICO case comes crashing down, Angela breaks ranks to form her own A-team. LaKeisha takes a stand of her own while “Ghost”, Tommy, Tasha, and Angela race against the clock to prove their innocence...but to what end?

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: Season 5 picks up with James “Ghost” St. Patrick in a dangerous alliance with his former drug partner Tommy Egan and mortal enemy Kanan Stark. As Ghost mourns, he searches for vengeance and throws himself into his work, reaching new, professional heights. But with this newfound publicity, his quest for blood threatens to dismantle his legitimate legacy. Ghost is blind to new enemies and, as the Feds grow closer to unmasking his true identity, Ghost must remain vigilant toward those wanting to take him down for his past criminal enterprises.

episodes.name: Murderers
episodes.overview: Ghost seeks vengeance due to the ill will of Tommy Egan. Tasha vows to get even with Ghost for the murder of Terry Silver. Tariq and Tommy mourn an old friend. The AUSA's Office is under new leadership.

episodes.name: Whose Side Are You On?
episodes.overview: Tommy lays low after his mustang is riddled with bullets. Tensions run high with Ghost and Jason. Tommy enlists LaKeisha to help with his business. Tasha confronts Ghost about Terry Silver.

episodes.name: Forgot About Dre
episodes.overview: Dre remains in Fed custody. Jason tasks Tommy and Ghost to kidnap Alicia Jiminez. Tommy teaches LaKeisha the drug game. Tariq's business begins to flourish. Tasha has a business plan of her own.

episodes.name: Why Is Tommy Still Alive?
episodes.overview: Tasha sparks a new flame. Ghost utilizes his resources in an attempt to kill Tommy. Tariq's in over his head with the Italians and Dre forms an unlikely alliance. Proctor hatches a plan to gain custody of his daughter.

episodes.name: King's Gambit
episodes.overview: Tasha revisits old habits when she begins to recruit soldiers for her new empire. Tariq pulls a ruse on Vincent. Proctor warns Tommy about a snitch. Ghost plans to take care of the snitch on his own terms.

episodes.name: Inside Man
episodes.overview: After being duped by Tariq, Vincent holds Tariq hostage. Ghost and Tommy call a temporary truce in order to face a common enemy. Tasha puts her differences to the side and turns to an unlikely ally for help.

episodes.name: Like Father, Like Son
episodes.overview: As the St. Patrick family is reunited, Ghost and Tasha butt heads on how to raise Tariq. LaKeisha creates new enemies within Tommy's organization. Jason tasks Ghost and Tommy to work together.

episodes.name: Deal With the Devil
episodes.overview: The Feds turn the heat up on Tommy and scare LaKeisha into cooperating. Ghost discontinues a relationship with an ally. Tasha confronts a snitch, which hits a little too close to home.

episodes.name: Scorched Earth
episodes.overview: As Ghost and Tommy move forward with their plan to kill Jason, Tommy enacts a plan of his own. Dre uses a ruse to force Tommy's organization to rebel against him. Tommy battles the kin of one of his past victims.

episodes.name: No One Can Stop Me
episodes.overview: Ghost is on top of the world. Meanwhile the Feds work to prove St. Patrick is guilty for the murder of Terry Silver. But when Ghost makes a political move, it triggers resentment from his many enemies.

episodes.name: Still DRE
episodes.overview: After being framed by Ghost for the murder of Jason Micic, Dre plans on leaving New York, but first he needs to take care of unfinished business.

episodes.name: He Always Wins
episodes.overview: Paz, still grieving Angela's death, seeks allies in the pursuit of justice-or vengeance. She forms an alliance with Warner. They hatch a plan to arrest Ghost for the murder of Angela. But things don't go as planned.

episodes.name: It's All Your Fault
episodes.overview: Tommy is on a path to avenge LaKeisha's murder; Elisa Marie investigates what's on the USB stick given to her by her father; Tommy must destroy the evidence, and he may need Ghost's help to retrieve it.

episodes.name: Reversal of Fortune
episodes.overview: Tensions run high when Tate tasks Dre to kill Ghost. Tate's hatred toward St. Patrick motivates him to lie during a Federal questioning. The Feds are in striking distance of convicting St. Patrick for Silver's murder.

episodes.name: Exactly How We Planned
episodes.overview: When Ghost is announced as Lt. Governor it gives him a solid win and makes him one step closer to a fully legitimate world. He soon discovers one of his many enemies carrying out a plan that changes his life forever.

6.name: Season 6
6.overview: The sixth and final season picks up with James “Ghost” St. Patrick seeking vengeance. His former drug partner and brother in arms must pay for the ultimate betrayal. Rocked to his core by the perfidiousness and cruelties of those he once called his family, Ghost devotes himself to one notion: Success is the best revenge, with all intentions of getting both.
